scripts.build-folder: rm -rf build/ && d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp && react-scripts build && yarn run manifest && cp -r i18n icon.png build
scripts.build-default: REACT_APP_DHIS2_BASE_URL='' REACT_APP_DHIS2_AUTH='' yarn build-folder && rm -f $npm_package_name.zip && cd build && rm -f manifest_mal.json mal-favicon.ico && zip --quiet -r ../$npm_package_name.zip *
scripts.mal-build-folder: rm -rf build/ && yarn run mal-manifest && react-scripts build && yarn run mal-build-manifest && cp -r i18n mal-icon.png build
scripts.mal-build: yarn mal-build-folder && rm -f $npm_package_name.zip && cd build && mv manifest_mal.json manifest.json && mv mal-favicon.ico favicon.ico && zip --quiet -r ../$npm_package_name.zip *
scripts.glass-build-folder: rm -rf build/ && yarn run glass-manifest && react-scripts build && yarn run glass-build-manifest && cp -r i18n glass-icon.png build
scripts.glass-build: yarn glass-build-folder && rm -f d2-reports-glass.zip && cd build && mv manifest_glass.json manifest.json && mv glass-favicon.ico favicon.ico && zip --quiet -r ../d2-reports-glass.zip *
scripts.build-report: REACT_APP_DHIS2_BASE_URL='' REACT_APP_DHIS2_AUTH='' yarn build && gulp build-report
scripts.build: REACT_APP_DHIS2_BASE_URL='' REACT_APP_DHIS2_AUTH='' npx ts-node -P tsconfig-cli.json src/scripts/build.ts
scripts.update-po: yarn extract-pot && for pofile in i18n/*.po; do msgmerge --backup=off -U $pofile i18n/en.pot; done
scripts.mal-manifest: d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_mal --manifest.icons.48='mal-icon.png' --manifest.name='DHIS2 MAL Approval Report' --manifest.description='DHIS2 MAL Approval Report'
scripts.mal-build-manifest: d2-manifest package.json build/manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_mal --manifest.icons.48 mal-icon.png --manifest.name='DHIS2 MAL Approval Report' --manifest.description='DHIS2 MAL Approval Report'
scripts.glass-manifest: d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_glass --manifest.icons.48='glass-icon.png' --manifest.name='DHIS2 GLASS Submission Report' --manifest.description='DHIS2 GLASS Submission Report'
scripts.glass-build-manifest: d2-manifest package.json build/manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_glass --manifest.icons.48 glass-icon.png --manifest.name='DHIS2 GLASS Submission Report' --manifest.description='DHIS2 GLASS Submission Report'

hooks.pre-push: yarn prettify && yarn lint && yarn update-po && yarn test
